title: Did not receive a response from server
body: hey guys,I installed lol on laptop and this is the message I get.tryed firewall and syncing my time still doesnt work

replies.body:
It sounds like you've gone through some of the steps on our Login issues guide. Since you're still seeing the issue, I suspect you may be seeing this due to a network incompatibility. Working through [our connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is the best route to resolving this issue.

Let me know the results!
